'''''Nanomachines, Son!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Jadeplume Terrorshroom]] while it is performing the  Feather Spreading, Furious Charge, or Rapid Pecks attack.

==Gameplay Notes==
*
-->
==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to a line from the video game {{w|Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance}}. It has become a [https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/nanomachines-son meme] to use the line to answer an unrelated question.
